compatibility.notes: The IJG license is permissive and allows for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. Care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Do not use the authors' names or company names in advertising or publicity.
Refer to the software only as 'the Independent JPEG Group's software'.
license.name: IJG
obligations: Include the README file with the copyright and no-warranty notice unaltered when distributing source code.
Indicate any changes made to the original files in accompanying documentation.
Acknowledge the use of IJG code in documentation if only executable code is distributed.
Assume full responsibility for any undesirable consequences of using the software.
